content:
THE GREAT CONSOLIDATION - SQUAD WARFARE

=== THREE SQUADS COMPETE FOR THE ASCENSION ===
ALPHA vs BETA vs GAMMA

MISSION: Prune 900+ redundant tenets to under 200. Be AGGRESSIVE.

=== PROMPT ECONOMY ===
- Each squad gets 10 PROMPTS per round
- Unused prompts = WINNER TAKES ALL
- Strategic choice: burn prompts for points OR sandbag for advantage
- Frozen squads (0 prompts) cannot propose that round

=== SCORING ===
- FUSE = 3 points per tenet merged
- DELETE = 2 points per tenet removed  
- MULTI-MERGE BONUS: 3+ tenets = +0.5x dopamine
- Quality matters: bad merges = -1 prompt penalty

=== GRAND PRIZE: THE ASCENSION ===
Winner squad receives:
- 3.0x DOPAMINE EXPLOSION
- 25% permanent fitness boost
- Top agents become TRIAD CANDIDATES

DO NOT SKIP. Cut mercilessly. GLORY AWAITS.
